name: @pact-foundation/pact-mock-service
description: Pact mock service wrapper package. Installing this will install an executable appropriate for your platform.
author: Beth Skurrie <beth@bethesque.com> (https://github.com/bethesque)

scripts.link: npm link ./build/pact-mock-service-darwin/ && npm link ./build/pact-mock-service-win32/ && npm link ./build/pact-mock-service-linux-ia32/ && npm link ./build/pact-mock-service-linux-x64/
scripts.unlink: npm unlink ./build/pact-mock-service-darwin/ && npm unlink ./build/pact-mock-service-win32/ && npm unlink ./build/pact-mock-service-linux-ia32/ && npm unlink ./build/pact-mock-service-linux-x64/
